thread.title: Would You Pay $3000 a Night to Stay in a Tent? Glamping Gone Wild!
thread.title_full: Would You Pay $3000 a Night to Stay in a Tent? Glamping Gone Wild!

title: Would You Pay $3000 a Night to Stay in a Tent? Glamping Gone Wild!
text:
Javascript needs to be enabled in your browser to use Yahoo Travel. 
Hereâ€™s how to turn it on: https://help.yahoo.com/kb/enable-javascript-browser-sln1648.html Would You Pay $3000 a Night to Stay in a Tent? Glamping Gone Wild! Ko Im August 31, 2015 I remember my first glamping experience in Goa, India. I felt like a rockstar inside a yurt that was part of a boutique hotel. For me, it was the perfect way to get in touch with nature, without totally slumming it. This idea of glamorous camping has been a trend for years, but now some of the experiences are getting downright luxurious. From Victorian villas in Napa Valley to high-class cabins in Alaska, these unique rentals on GlampingHub make camping look good. Tumblr
